
Full docs
================

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 3

   full_docs


Note there are some small inaccuracies in these docs. I autogenerated these
with Sphinx and had to conform to Python's syntax and the autogenerating rules.

Interfacing with C
+++++++++++++++++++
.. automodule:: c_docs
    :members:

Tips
-------
* Use ``.cint``, ``.cfloat``, ``.cdouble`` to pass numeric values to C.
